column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Maybe I'm just an out of towner who doesn't know good pizza
column2: but this just wasn't good.  The huge crowd outside totally made me think this pizza would be crazy good
column3: but it was just meh.  I got the Chicago Classic and the three cheese bread.  You could tell the ingredients were fresh
column4: but that's the only good thing I can say about the food.  I could have lived the rest of my life without trying Chicago's famous deep dish pizza and not felt like I missed out on anything.
